name: IronClaw Self-Evolution
description: Review own campaign results, update workspace files, improve capabilities. Consolidates learnings from all IronClaw campaigns into persistent memory.
process: Review recent campaign results from MEMORY.md and daily memory logs in /workspace/memory/
Query juggler_campaign_status() and juggler_audit_log() for recent activity
Identify recurring patterns: frequent false positives, missed findings, tool failures, timeout issues
Update /workspace/memory/MEMORY.md with consolidated learnings (keep concise, remove duplicates)
If TOOLS.md needs updating (tool behavior changed, new tools available, gotchas discovered), update it
If AGENTS.md instructions are stale or incomplete, note proposed improvements as findings
Check openclaw/openclaw reference project for new features that could enhance capabilities
Store evolution summary in Setec via juggler_setec_put
Report findings summarizing what was learned and what was updated

metrics.successCriteria: Memory reviewed and updated, patterns consolidated, workspace files current
